Aapeli Haanpuu

Who am I? Glad you asked. I am a young open-minded coder who loves intellectual challenges, all kinds of sports and some artsy stuff, like handicrafts.

Want to find out more? Please take a look at this site or contact me!

LearnerLearner

For me, every day is an opportunity to learn something new. Even if it's biking backwards or learning a new coding language I never miss the chance.

ThinkerThinker

Problem-solving and thinking outside the box is my thing. I like to take my time to ponder things thoroughly, but don't hesitate to make decisions.

AchieverAchiever

I like to get things done. I enjoy doing handicrafts because, just as coding, it rewards with instant results.

Code and stuff

Top words for me at the moment are Node.js, React.js, HTML5 and CSS3. As you may notice, I'm mostly into front-end development nowadays, but don't mind doing good old back-end either.

Some of these projects I've done either for myself or for my computer science studies (In University of Helsinki). Those can be found on my Github page. However, most of my coding I've done for my current employer, . If you have any questions considering any of these projects, please don't be afraid to ask!

Also, on my free time I've done many origami projects, and like to draw and do other kinds of handicrafts too.
